properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 10:12AM CST until February 11 at 3:36PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Little Tallahatchie Canal...S.F. of the Forked Deer River...Yalobusha
River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Yalobusha River at Calhoun City
* from Monday February 10 until Tuesday February 11.
* At 09 AM Monday the stage was...19.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 23.5 feet on Tuesday February 11.
* Flood stage is 23.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Monday February 10 and
continue to rise to near 23.5 feet by Tuesday February 11. The
river will fall below flood stage by Tuesday February 11.
* At 23.0 feet...Widespread lowland and agricultural flooding is
occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
